knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Initialisation

The package 'polmineR' is required. We use the "REUTERS"-corpus that is included in the package.

```{r loading_libraries}
library(polmineR)
use("polmineR")
```


```{r}
setwd("~/Lab/gitlab/polmineR.anno/inst/extdata/html")
```

```{r}
for (country in c("canada", "qatar", "argentina", "kuwait")){
  P <- partition("REUTERS", places = country, name = country)
  H <- html(P, cpos = TRUE, charoffset = TRUE)
  cat(as.character(H), file = sprintf("%s.html", country))
}
```
